backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing the core backend for an e-commerce app, defining domain types (products, orders, media, inquiries, site content, users) and in-memory storage maps with constants for cancellation windows and media limits.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report documenting completed styling features, listing feature IDs, descriptions, affected files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all major frontend React components, pages, hooks, and admin modules for reference and planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base configuration defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and default background, border, and text styles used across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app that mounts the root element and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application entry configuring TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, toaster notifications, and profile setup flow after authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin interface for managing homepage carousel slides, including image upload, URL editing, enable/disable toggles, reordering, and persistence via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin UI for viewing customer inquiries, showing pending/answered status, and sending text responses via mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin dashboard for viewing orders, updating order status, formatting prices/dates, and printing detailed order invoices in a new window.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form used to add or edit products, managing name, description, price, stock status, and media uploads (images/videos) with previews and limits.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin interface to list products, open the product form for add/edit, display basic product info, and delete products with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form for editing static site content such as contact details, policies, footer text, and general information, backed by fetch/update hooks.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Homepage carousel component that fetches enabled slides, auto-rotates with hover pause, supports navigation controls, and links slides to external URLs with animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with a sticky header, navigation, authentication handling, and conditional links for cart, dashboard, and admin based on user state.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal dialog that displays detailed order information, status badges, and allows users to cancel eligible orders with a selected reason.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Carousel component that displays a product’s video (if any) and images with navigation arrows and dots in a square aspect ratio.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form that forces new users to complete their profile and saves it via the backend actor, updating related queries and admin status.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: File present but contains no implementation or exported component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity, initializes admin access control, and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Defines a Zustand store for shopping cart state with persistent storage, supporting add/remove/update items and computing total item count and total price.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (users, admin status, products, orders, carousel slides, etc.) using an actor and identity context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS and defines an extensive set of CSS variables for light and dark themes, establishing the luxury color palette and design tokens used across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wiring up React Query and Internet Identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with access control, summary statistics, and tabbed management views for products, orders, inquiries, site content, and carousel slides.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's shopping cart, handling empty and unauthenticated states, item quantity management, removal, and total price presentation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step checkout flow that collects shipping address, processes UPI payment details, creates orders for cart items, and redirects based on authentication and cart state.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated contact form allowing logged-in users to submit customer inquiries, with validation, submission via backend mutation, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Displays an authenticated customer dashboard with tabs for orders and inquiries, order status summaries, and an order detail modal for viewing individual order information.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a product carousel and product grid, allowing authenticated users to add items to the cart or navigate to product details.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder file intended for an orders listing or management page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Empty or placeholder file intended to display payment failure feedback to the user.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Empty or placeholder file intended to display payment success confirmation after checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single product with media carousel, pricing, stock status, and actions to add to cart or buy now for authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, persist them to sessionStorage, and retrieve or clear them across navigation. Includes helpers for prioritizing URL values over stored values and safely managing sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode behavior, content scanning paths, container settings, and an extended theme with a large custom color palette, radii, shadows, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the project’s current state, including schema/versioning, a high-level product summary, and a catalog of implemented features spanning ICP backend canisters, RBAC, authentication, frontend architecture, and e-commerce functionality.
